messages: 24055ea02cb2a4025221a9d3406087d0 (17:31): is it possible to use some kind of form element to browse to a directory and specify the path to a dir, instead of a file?
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (17:31): lra_: No
24055ea02cb2a4025221a9d3406087d0 (17:31): damn :( so the only way is with a text input?
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (17:32): lra_: Yes
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:32): Ira: maybe you can use php to parse the input?
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:33): or maybe javascript can help
24055ea02cb2a4025221a9d3406087d0 (17:33): |oranjia| - i was thinking about stripping a file name of a file in the dir i want, but what if it's a blank dir
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:33): Ira a blank directory should still give input
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:33): or i could be wrong
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (17:33): lra_: There's no guarentee that the browser will send information about the file path on the user's system with the uploaded file.
24055ea02cb2a4025221a9d3406087d0 (17:34): just text input rahter
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:34): Ira: you sure there's no javascript around that can allow you to browse directories
ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (17:37): are meta tags still useful?
ad7e25107704cb85b75f6a1ecaeaede5 (17:37): I mean do search engines ignore them totally now?
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (17:38): caverdude: Useful - yes. Useful for indexing by public search engines - no.
b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:41): Ira_: I may have been wrong : http://www.webdeveloper.com/forum/showthread.php?threadid=109231

b20eee5051f0f449c8395a90673e4c3b (17:43): Ira_: Also http://216.109.125.130/search/cache?p=javascript+folder+browse&prssweb=Search&ei=UTF-8&fr=flo&x=wrt&u=www.forum4designers.com/message124253.html&w=javascript+folder+browse&d=VtehhWP9NL4K&icp=1&.intl=us
38e04b49097b4e5268f54eb700cc893b (17:43): i have problem with div
38e04b49097b4e5268f54eb700cc893b (17:46): how do i apply margin with display:table-cell ?????
8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (17:47): minori_aoi: You don't. Things that display as table-cells do not have margins. Things that are display: table have border-spacing and margins of their own.
